channel.title: Posts on Skylee Nelson's GitHub Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Skylee Nelson's GitHub Site

item.title: '96 Bulls vs '16 Warriors: Who is the best basketball team?
item.description: library(tidyverse) library(ggplot2) library(ggrepel) library(ggalt) library(ggbump) library(cowplot) library(waffle) library(gt) playerstats <-read_csv("TotalPlayerStats - Sheet1 (1).csv") cbteam <- read_csv("ChicagoBullsPerGameStats - Sheet1.csv") gsteam <- read_csv("GoldenStatePerGameStats - Sheet1.csv") regularseason <- read_csv("RegSeasonStats - Sheet1 copy.csv") gs<- regularseason %>% filter(Team == "Golden State Warriors") cb<- regularseason %>% filter(Team == "Chicago Bulls") teamvsopp<- read_csv("teamvsopp - Sheet1.csv") postseason <- read_csv("postseasonpts - Sheet1.csv") gamelogs <- read_csv("gamelogs - Sheet1.csv") cblogs <- gamelogs %>% filter(Team == "Chicago Bulls") gslogs <- gamelogs %>% filter(Team == "Golden State Warriors") bar1 <- ggplot() + geom_bar(data=teamvsopp, aes(x=Team, weight=PTS, fill=Type)) + scale_fill_manual(values =c("grey", "blue")) + coord_flip() + labs( x="", y="", title= "Total regular season points made vs points allowed", subtitle = "Golden State gave up more points in the regular season but ended with a better record.

item.title: Which Plumlee brother is the best?
item.description: Miles, Mason, and Marshall Plumlee were all top-ranked basketball recruits heading into college at Duke University. The brother’s spent four years on the Blue Devils roster, and in that time each have contributed to winning a national championship. The brothers’ success at Duke ultimately led each of them to reach the highest level of basketball playing in the NBA. The Plumlee trio was an unforgettable time for Blue Devils basketball.
